TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventLogWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public NotInheritable Class EventLogWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class EventLogWebEventProvider sealed : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 實作事件提供者，將 ASP.NET 健康監視事件記錄至 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔。

span.span: Implements an event provider that logs ASP.NET health-monitoring events into the Windows Application Event Log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. ，失敗稽核和錯誤健全狀況監視的事件設定 （預設已啟用）。The , the failure audit, and the error health-monitoring events are configured (enabled) by default. 這表示稽核失敗和健全狀況監視的事件預設會記錄在 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔的錯誤。This means that the failure audit and the error health-monitoring events are logged in the Windows Application Event Log by default. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂提供者的範例，請參閱[How to： 實作健全狀況監視自訂提供者範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下列組態檔摘錄示範如何指定的型別提供者處理成功稽核事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to specify a provider of type to handle success audit events. 和預設會設定要監視的失敗稽核健全狀況事件類型。The and the failure audit health-event types to monitor are configured by default. 若要監視成功稽核，您必須進行設定後，範例程式碼所示。To monitor the success audits, you need to configure them, as shown in the example code. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 將事件從提供者的緩衝區移至事件記錄檔。

span.span: Moves events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法時，從最後一次寫入或緩衝區中有多少事件以來已經過所有的提供者緩衝區中的事件都會立即寫入 Windows 應用程式事件記錄，而不論多少時間。When this method is called, all the events in the provider's buffer are immediately written to the Windows Application Event Log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 清除動作的時間會重設上次寫入時間。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. 如果未啟用緩衝機制，呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。If the buffering mechanism is not enabled, calling this method does not have any effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name
param.span: 在組態檔中用來識別這個提供者的名稱。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: ，指定組態檔中指派給這個提供者的屬性。

span.span: A that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.

summary.span: 設定這個物件的初始值。

span.span: Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法呼叫以初始化的組態設定和組態檔中所指定的名稱。This method is called to initialize the with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 處理傳遞給提供者的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 ASP.NET 健康監視呼叫來啟動處理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 執行與關閉提供者關聯的工作。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫裝載 Web 應用程式的應用程式定義域終止時的方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 方法會呼叫以執行工作，可讓應用程式正常結束。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
